p: As shown in Table 1, similar to that of the reference qRT-PCR for all four serotypes, the sensitivity of the RT-iiPCR system was at biological titers of around 10 0 PFU/ml. This was consistent to the performance of other molecular detection methods for DENV [ 37– 39]. As reported previously, RNA copy numbers were likely significantly higher than PUFs, due to defective virus particles or viral RNA freed from infected cells in the sample matrix [ 40– 42].
